phrase.item: I stood on top of mountains and yelled.
I stood on top of mountains and yelled.
Ali, Lion of God, I worshipped for you.
Ali, Lion of God, I worshipped for you.
My painful voice has reached Badakhshan.
My painful voice has reached Badakhshan.
The ruby of Badakhshan I saw in my dream.
The ruby of Badakhshan I saw in my dream.
You are the nightengale, oh Ambar of Pamir.
You are the ruby of Badakhshan, oh Amber of Pamir.
You are the summer season's warmth, Ambar of Pamir.
And the snowfall of winter, Ambar of Pamir.
And the snowfall of winter, Ambar of Pamir.
Your skilled mother and her good teaching [which you learned from her]
Your skilled mother and her good teaching [which you learned from her]
You are the blossom [flower] from this garden.
You are the blossom [flower] form this garden.
You are the nightangle, oh Ambar of Pamir.
You are the ruby of Badakhshan, oh Amber of Pamir.
You are the summer season's warmth, Ambar of Pamir.
And the snowfall of winter, Ambar of Pamir.
And the snowfall of winter, Ambar of Pamir.
You are the nightingale, oh Ambar of Pamir.
You are the ruby of Badakhshan, oh Amber of Pamir.
You are the summer season's warmth, Ambar of Pamir.
And the snowfall of winter, Ambar of Pamir.
And the snowfall of winter, Ambar of Pamir.
